switch.name: fcs/elevator/input
switch.description: If flight input is used to control CI/TI/MI cursor, flight controls are frozen.

switch.name: fcs/aileron/input
switch.description: If flight input is used to control CI/TI/MI cursor, flight controls are frozen.

switch.name: fcs/rudder/input
switch.description: If flight input is used to control CI/TI/MI cursor, flight controls are frozen.

switch.name: fcs/elevator/cmg-limit-pos
switch.description: As per manual with gears out no more than 3G allowed.

switch.name: fcs/elevator/cmg-limit-neg
switch.description: As per manual with gears out no less than 0G allowed.

switch.name: fcs/elevator/normal-1-special
switch.description: This prevents NaN to propagate through the system

switch.name: fcs/pitch-damper/active
switch.test: gear/unit[0]/WOW ne 1 aero/spin-norm == 0 fcs/pitch-damper/enable ne 0.0 fcs/pitch-damper/serviceable == 1 /systems/electrical/outputs/ac-main-voltage gt 150

switch.name: names/roll-limiter/active
switch.test: aero/alpha-deg ge -10 aero/alpha-deg le 10 gear/unit[0]/WOW ne 1 gear/unit[1]/WOW ne 1 gear/unit[2]/WOW ne 1 aero/spin-norm == 0 fcs/roll-limiter/enable ne 0.0 fcs/roll-limiter/serviceable == 1 /systems/electrical/outputs/ac-main-voltage gt 150

switch.name: names/roll-damper/active
switch.test: aero/alpha-deg ge -30 aero/alpha-deg le 30 gear/unit[0]/WOW ne 1 gear/unit[1]/WOW ne 1 gear/unit[2]/WOW ne 1 aero/spin-norm == 0 fcs/roll-damper/enable ne 0.0 fcs/roll-damper/serviceable == 1 /systems/electrical/outputs/ac-main-voltage gt 150
